name: Fashion Raider
description:
The game Fashion Raider is a game about a young man —— Ben, building his way up and finding those notorious fashion designers who designed too many exciting products that made Ben spent all his money! The scene of the story is set in city buildings, but the sky is not your limit. Use the boxes with the brand logo as the ladder to build up; go find the designer to get revenge. Using WASD to control direction, SPACE to jump, J to shoot, and K to build, be careful with the falling objects and enemy’s fire!

WASD to move

J to shoot

K to build

Space to Jump

Shoot to eliminate box and enemy
